shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Introduction (fols. 2ra-6vc) - Mäqdǝmä wängel “Introduction to the Gospels” (fols. 2ra-3vc) - “Synopsis of Classes” (fols. 3vc-4ra) - “On the 72 Disciples” (fol. 4ra) - Letter of Eusebius to Carpianus (fols. 4ra-4rc) - On the reliability of the Gospel (fols. 4rc-4va) - Statment about the Eusebian sections (fol. 4va-4vb) - Canon tables (fols. 5ra-6vc), incomplete II) Gospel of Matthew (fols. 7ra-45vc) - Bǝsratä Matewos “Gospel of Matthew” (fols. 7ra-45ra) - Postscript (fol. 45ra-45rb) III) Gospel of Mark (fols. 45rb-62vc) - Biography of Mark (fol. 45rb-45va) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Mark: 49 titles (fol. 45va-45vc) - Bǝsratä Marqos “Gospel of Mark” (fols. 46ra-62ra) - Postscript (fol. 62rb) IV) Gospel of Luke (fols. 62rb-100v) - Biography of Luke (fol. 62rb-62rc) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Luke: 81 titles (fols. 62rc-62vc) - Bǝsratä Luqas “Gospel of Luke” (fols. 64ra-100ra) - Postscript (fol. 100ra-100rb) V) Gospel of John (fols. 100rb-131rb) - Biography of John (fols. 100rb-100vb) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of John: 20 titles (fol. 100vb-100vc) - Bǝsratä Yoḥannǝs “Gospel of John” (fols. 101ra-131rb) - Postscript (fol.131rb-131rc)
Additiones 1-2.

copyists.copyist: The name of the scribe, now unreadable, was mentioned in Additio 2.

donors.donor: Täklä Wängel is mentioned in the headings of the Gospels on fols. 7r, 46r, 64r, 101r and in Additio 2.

dcomments.dcomment: Second half of the 19th cent. (?) Additio 1, dated to the time of King Yoḥannǝs IV (r. 1872-89), is probably executed in the same hand as that of the main text.

txstates.txstate:
Fols. 1, 2, 130, 132 are slightly damaged, fol. 131 is mutilated. Fol. 29 is of slightly irregular form. Fol. 132 is a single leaf loosely inserted between the last folio of quire XVIII and the back board. Holes or tears roughly amended on fols. 4, 9, 19, 33, 38, 48, 62, 77, 92, 103, 106, 120, 122, 123.
Colour of the parchment and ink of quire I is different from the rest of the Ms.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the remains of the brown leather cover is visible on the front board and on the turn-ins (at least 9 tools were used: double sine wave, cross hatching, triple line fillet, single circle, criss-cross, triple dot fillet, double crescent, corni-form, small x).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold and in the centre fold of the quires, close to the head and tail of the codex.

squires.squire: I(2/fols. 1r-2v) – II(4/fols. 3r-6v) – III፩(8/fols. 7r-14v) – ፪IV(8/fols. 15r-22v) –፫V(8/fols. 23r-30v) – ፬VI(8/fols. 31r-38v) – ፭VII(8/fols. 39r-46v) – ፮VIII(10/fols. 47r-56v) – ፯IX(7; s.l.: 1, stub after 7/fols. 57r-63v) – ፰X(8/fols. 64r-71v) – ፱XI(8/fols. 72r-79v) – ፲XII(8/fols. 80r-87v) – ፲፩XIII(8/fols. 88r-95v) – ፲፪XIV(8/fols. 96r-103v) – ፲፫XV(8/fols. 104r-111r) – ፲፬XVI(6/fols. 112r-117v) – ፲፭XVII(8/fols. 118r-125v) – ፲፮XVIII(6/fols. 126r-131v) – XIX(1; s.l.: 1/fol. 132)

taunit.mr-info: Quire II: all data are for fol. 2r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A1A1A/0-0/0-0/C The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Quires III-XVIII: all data are for fol. 8r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A1A1A/0-0/0-0/C The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Quire I is possibly written in a different hand (belonging to the same period of time).

rubrications.rubrication: Headings and incipits of the texts; on the incipit page of each Gospel a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines); numbers of the “tituli”; chapter numbers and the word mǝʿǝraf; parts of the Canon tables; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

otherdetails.otherdetail: The biography and the list of “tituli” for the Gospel of Matthew are missing.

additional.cont: Fol. 63r: Note on the land charter issued by King Yoḥannəs IV (r. 1872-89) to May ˀAnbäsa.
additional.det: In Amharic; the note concerns the gwǝlt to May ʾAnbäsa donated by King Yoḥannǝs IV (r. 1872-89).

additional.cont: Fol. 131rc: Donation note (?)
additional.det: The note is effaced. The name of the donor Täklä Wängel and the name of his wife are still readable; the note contained also the name of the scribe, written in red ink, now unreadable.

extras.extra: - Incomplete list of the items owned by the monastery, crudely written in blue pen: fol. 1v. - The title ብስራተ፡ አብ፡ ትሩፍ፡ is carefully written in red ink on ol. 1v. - A strip of parchment is inserted (?): fol. 7r. - Small cross on the left margin of the first column of fol. 94r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the inner margin, close to the first written line, on each initial fol. of the quire: 14v (close to the first line of column c, the last fol. the quire) 15r, 23r, 31r, 39r, 47r, 57r, 64r, 72r, 80r, 88r, 96r, 104r, 112r, 118r, 126r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - A thread is inserted in the upper corner of fol. 46r.
